name: Kaffir Lime Lemonade
keywords: club soda, kaffir lime leaves, lemon juice, sugar, summer
recipeIngredient: 10 kaffir lime leaves (available where Thai ingredients are sold)
2 cups cold club soda or seltzer

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan combine the water, sugar and lime leaves over medium heat. Bring to a boil, lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Set aside to cool. Refrigerate until cold. Fill each of 4 glasses with 1/2 cup of the syrup, 2 tablespoons lemon juice and 1/2 cup club soda. Stir. Add ice and serve.
